{"id":1025858991,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1692458645,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"64 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1025858991/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sorting Three Groups","memory":"88.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> temp;\n    int minimumOperations(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int n=nums.size();\n        \n        int ct=0;\n        temp.push_back(nums[0]);\n        for(int i=1;i<n;i++){\n            auto l=lower_bound(temp.begin(),temp.end(),nums[i]);\n            auto u=upper_bound(temp.begin(),temp.end(),nums[i]);\n            if(u==temp.end()) {\n                temp.push_back(nums[i]);\n            }else{\n                int ind=u-temp.begin();\n                temp[ind]=min(temp[ind],nums[i]);\n                ct++;\n            }\n        }\n        return ct;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sorting-three-groups","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
